requirements: Non-competes RESTRICTED - statutory requirements (effective 2020)

New Hampshire law requires: (1) non-compete must be in writing signed by employee, (2) employee paid during restricted period OR other consideration provided, (3) specific protectable interest identified, (4) presented before job acceptance or with new consideration if during employment.
Best practice: Provide consideration, present before job offer, limit reasonably
Action required: Ensure: written agreement, consideration provided, protectable interest stated, proper timing
